summary: Ever since I was a teenager, I have been passionate about programming. I started with BASIC, gradually moved to C, C++ during my college days, and now I am a full time Developer/Tech Lead, working primarily with Java, Python and C#. The passion remains with me even today and stronger infact. I always feel excited to try new Languages and Technologies. I love to be part of Hackathons and Open source communities.

availability.message: I am currently open to consulating and freelance collaborations. Feel free to reach out!

experience.description: Leading application development initiatives and delivering scalable software solutions
achievements: Driving technical excellence and innovation in software development projects
Contributing to architecture decisions and implementation of best practices
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality applications

experience.description: Leading development of customized Voice workflow solutions for global customers
achievements: Gathered requirements from clients and designed and deployed effective customized Voice workflow solutions for 6 different customers across APAC, EMEA, and the USA to date
Developed 5 new modules in Java and 2 new applications in C# from scratch which were reusable across different customers and were integrated into Core Voice offerings
Enhanced performance of the Core Java middleware to handle 10 times larger assignments
Learned technical workings of new Honeywell Voice solutions quickly and trained team members. This reduced the adoption time of new solutions of the team by 60%
Designed and developed a new tool for release management using Python-Django for backend and React.js for frontend

experience.description: Team lead for custom solutions development and proof of concepts
achievements: Led team of 5 developers and testers in 9 projects and 4 proof of concepts
Member of designing team in 6 customization projects
Independently created 5 pilots that won the follow-up projects
Standardized build process for the custom solutions which decreased human errors by 52% and build times by 43%

experience.description: Custom solution implementation and hackathon participation
achievements: Implemented and delivered 4 custom solutions before anticipated deadlines
Engaged in internal Hackathons to work on proof of concepts. Secured 2nd position in one of them

experience.description: Yellow-pages middleware development using Java-Spring framework
achievements: Developed 5 modules of the yellow-pages middleware using Java-Spring
Learned about the Media and Information Services domain and the yellow pages solutions within the first 3 months
Contributed to different back-end modules to gain domain expertise

certifications.name: Building Scalable Java Microservices with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
